nodes.text: The Silver Falcon was a casino on the planet Vulta. In the year 3653 BBY, the smuggler Zeerid Korr entered and quickly exited the Silver Falcon to make sure he was not being followed while he was on his way to buy a hoverchair for his crippled daughter, Arra Yooms.
The Silver Falcon first appeared in the 2011 novel The Old Republic: Deceived, written by Paul S. Kemp.
